summary: The diff implements the majority of the QuickRepair rebrand requirements. All core components (Navbar, Hero, Services, AboutUs, ContactUs, Footer, FloatingButtons) are rebuilt or updated. Removed components (BookingForm, BookingHistory, EmergencySOS, InAppChat, LiveTracking, OtpFlow, PaymentPage, ProviderProfile, ProviderRegistrationForm, ProvidersSection, RatingReview, ReferEarn, ScheduleBooking) are wiped from the UI. Most requirements are satisfied. A few concerns exist: tailwind.config.js and index.css are not visible in the diff (omitted due to limits), creating uncertainty about brand token registration. The copyright line uses a dynamic year instead of hardcoded 2024. Extra UI elements not specified in the requirements were added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Tailwind config and index.css updated with #FFD700 yellow and #ff8c42 orange brand tokens
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include tailwind.config.js or index.css among the visible modified files. Components reference 'text-brand-yellow', 'text-brand-orange', 'bg-navy' etc., implying tokens should exist, but the actual config/CSS files are listed as omitted due to limits so confirmation is not possible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Copyright line reads 'Â© 2024 QuickRepair. All rights reserved.'
missing_requirements.reason: The footer uses a dynamic year via new Date().getFullYear() rather than the hardcoded '2024' specified in the requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Stats bar in About section showing '500+ Happy Customers', '10 Min Avg Response Time', '50+ Verified Mechanics', '6 Service Areas'
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-41 specifies exactly 4 feature cards and does not mention a stats bar. The diff adds a stats bar with numeric statistics that was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Trust badges in Hero section showing '10 Min Response', 'Verified Mechanics', 'Cash on Delivery', 'No Hidden Charges'
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-37 explicitly requires removing stat badges from the Hero section. New badge-like pill elements were added that were not specified in REQ-37.

hallucinated_features.description: Scroll indicator widget (bouncing arrow) at the bottom of the Hero section
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-37 does not mention a scroll indicator. This is an extra UI element not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Our Services list column in the Footer showing all 5 services with prices
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-43 specifies footer quick links (Home, Services, About, Contact) and contact info but does not specify a separate 'Our Services' column in the footer with a price list.
